body_html: Does this fix #3880 completely? As I understand it, at each epoch the worker processes are created fresh, so if the main process never calls random functions, torch.initial_seed() will always be the same in every worker at every epoch. In that case, the randomness is still restricted.
body_text: Does this fix #3880 completely? As I understand it, at each epoch the worker processes are created fresh, so if the main process never calls random functions, torch.initial_seed() will always be the same in every worker at every epoch. In that case, the randomness is still restricted.
body: Does this fix #3880 completely? As I understand it, at each epoch the worker processes are created fresh, so if the main process never calls random functions, `torch.initial_seed()` will always be the same in every worker at every epoch. In that case, the randomness is still restricted.
